articles.title: A robot arm with puppy dog eyes is just one of Lenovo's new desktop AI concepts

articles.title: The new Yoga 9i 2-in-1 from Lenovo has an angled ‘canvas mode’ for easier note-taking
articles.description: Lenovo has a few new Yoga laptops it's announcing at MWC 2026: the 14-inch Yoga Slim 7i Aura Edition, 15-inch Yoga Pro 7a, and 14-inch Yoga 9i 2-in-1 Aura Edition. articles.title: Lenovo’s redesigned ThinkPad Detachable tablet has a bigger screen and legit keyboard
articles.description: Lenovo is announcing five new ThinkPads and a new ThinkBook laptop for MWC 2026. There are various new chip offerings and updates for this swathe of ThinkPads, but the device I find the most interesting is the X13 Detachable. articles.title: Lenovo made a Framework-like laptop with modular ports — and a second screen
articles.description: One of Lenovo's big laptop concepts for MWC 2026 is a modular ThinkBook with two screens. Officially called the ThinkBook Modular AI PC Concept, the proof-of-concept is a 14-inch productivity machine with two plug-and-play interchangeable ports and a second 14-inch display magnetically attached to the rear of its lid. articles.title: Portable Sonos Play speaker leaks on Canadian Best Buy
articles.description: An unannounced Sonos speaker called Play has been spotted on the Canadian Best Buy site. The Sonos Play looks like a slightly shrunk-down version of the Move 2 with a loop on the back for toting it around. articles.description: In a statement on X, Kalshi CEO Tarek Mansour said his company would pay out positions on "Ali Khamenei out as Supreme Leader?" at the last trading price before his death.
